column1: You can build apps with Flutter using any text editor combined with our
command-line tools. However, we recommend using one of our editor plugins for an
even better experience. These plugins provide you with code completion, syntax
highlighting, widget editing assists, run & debug support, and more.
column2: 你可以使用任意文本编辑器，结合我们的命令行工具来开发 Flutter 应用。

column1: 然而，我们推荐使用我们的编辑器插件以获取更好的开发体验。这些插件提供了代码补全、
代码高亮、widget 辅助编辑的功能，以及为项目的运行和调试提供支持等。
Follow the steps below to add an editor plugin for Android Studio, IntelliJ, or
VS Code. If you want to use a different editor, that's OK, skip ahead to the
[next step: Test drive](/docs/get-started/test-drive).
column2: 参考以下步骤为 Android Studio、IntelliJ 或者 VS Code 添加编辑器插件。

column1: 如果你想使用其他的编辑器，请直接打开 [下一节: 开发体验初探](/docs/get-started/test-drive)，
来查看使用其他文本编辑器配合命令行工具来创建和运行 Flutter 应用。

Install VS Code
column2: 安装 VS Code

column1: VS Code is a light-weight editor with Flutter app execution and debug support.
column2: VS Code 是一个可以运行和调试 Flutter 的轻量级编辑器。

column1: [VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/), latest stable version
column2: [VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/)，最新稳定版本

column1: Install the Flutter and Dart plugins
column2: 安装 Flutter 和 Dart 插件

column1: Start VS Code.
column2: 打开 VS Code。

column1: Invoke **View > Command Palette...**.
column2: 打开 **查看 > 命令面板…**。

column1: Type "install", and select **Extensions: Install Extensions**.
column2: 输入 "install"，然后选择 **扩展: 安装扩展**。

column1: Type "flutter" in the extensions search field, select **Flutter** in the list,
and click **Install**. This also installs the required Dart plugin.
column2: 在扩展搜索输入框中输入 "flutter"，然后在列表中选择 **Flutter** 并单击 **安装**。

column1: 此过程中会自动安装必需的 Dart 插件。
Click **Reload to Activate** to reload VS Code.
column2: 点击 **重新加载** 以重新启动 VS Code。

column1: Validate your setup with the Flutter Doctor
column2: 通过 Flutter Doctor 命令验证是否安装成功

column1: Invoke **View > Command Palette...**.
column2: 打开 **查看 > 命令面板…**。

column1: Type "doctor", and select the **Flutter: Run Flutter Doctor**.
column2: 输入 "doctor"，选择 **Flutter: Run Flutter Doctor**。

column1: Review the output in the **OUTPUT** pane for any issues.
column2: 打开 **输出** 面板查看是否有错误。
